017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
021import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
022import java.io.Serializable;
023
024import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
025
026import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType;
027import java.lang.reflect.GenericDeclaration;
028import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
029import java.lang.reflect.Type;
030
031import java.util.Arrays;
032import java.util.Objects;
033
034/**
035 * A deliberately partial implementation of the {@link TypeVariable}
036 * interface suitable only for use cases that involve checking
037 * {@linkplain #getBounds()} and no other.
038 *
039 * <p>Specifically, instances of this class return a {@link
040 * NonexistentGenericDeclaration} instance from the {@link
041 * #getGenericDeclaration()} method, and contain no annotation
042 * information.</p>
043 *
044 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
045 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
046 *
047 * @see NonexistentGenericDeclaration
048 */
049public final class PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable extends AbstractType implements TypeVariable<NonexistentGenericDeclaration> {
050
051
052  /*
053   * Static fields.
054   */
055
056
057  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
058
059
060  /*
061   * Instance fields.
062   */
063
064
065  private String name;
066
067  private transient Type[] bounds;
068
069  private transient int hashCode;
070
071
072  /*
073   * Constructors.
074   */
075
076
077  /**
078   * Creates a new {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}.
079   *
080   * @param name the name of this {@link
081   * PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}; must not be {@code null}
082   *
083   * @param bounds the bounds of this {@link
084   * PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}; may be {@code null} or
085   * zero-length in which case {@link AbstractType#OBJECT} will be
086   * used instead
087   *
088   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null}
089   */
090  public PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable(final String name,
091                                          final Type[] bounds) {
092    super();
093    this.name = Objects.requireNonNull(name, "name");
094    this.bounds = bounds == null || bounds.length <= 0 ? OBJECT : bounds;
095    this.hashCode =
096      Objects.hash(this.getName(),
097                   this.getBounds());
098  }
099
100  PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable(final TypeVariable<? extends GenericDeclaration> other) {
101    this(other.getGenericDeclaration(), other.getName());
102  }
103
104  PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable(final GenericDeclaration genericDeclaration,
105                                   final String name) {
106    super();
107    this.name = name;
108    TypeVariable<?> realVariable = null;
109    for (final TypeVariable<?> tv : genericDeclaration.getTypeParameters()) {
110      if (tv.getName().equals(name)) {
111        realVariable = tv;
112        break;
113      }
114    }
115    this.bounds = realVariable.getBounds();
116    this.hashCode =
117      Objects.hash(this.getName(),
118                   this.getBounds());
119  }
120
121
122  /*
123   * Instance methods.
124   */
125
126
127  /**
128   * Returns the name of this {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}.
129   *
130   * @return the name of this {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}
131   *
132   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
133   *
134   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
135   * threads.
136   *
137   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
138   */
139  @Override
140  public final String getName() {
141    return this.name;
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Returns a {@link NonexistentGenericDeclaration} instance when
146   * invoked.
147   *
148   * @return a {@link NonexistentGenericDeclaration} instance when
149   * invoked
150   *
151   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
152   *
153   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
154   * threads.
155   *
156   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
157   */
158  @Override
159  public final NonexistentGenericDeclaration getGenericDeclaration() {
160    return NonexistentGenericDeclaration.INSTANCE;
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * Returns the bounds of this {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}.
165   *
166   * <p>The bounds returned may be modified by the caller.</p>
167   *
168   * @return the bounds of this {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}
169   *
170   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
171   *
172   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
173   * threads.
174   *
175   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
176   */
177  @Override
178  public final Type[] getBounds() {
179    return this.bounds.clone();
180  }
181
182  /**
183   * Returns a copy of {@link AbstractType#EMPTY_ANNOTATED_TYPE_ARRAY} when invoked.
184   *
185   * @return a copy of {@link AbstractType#EMPTY_ANNOTATED_TYPE_ARRAY}
186   *
187   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
188   *
189   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
190   * threads.
191   *
192   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
193   */
194  @Override
195  public final AnnotatedType[] getAnnotatedBounds() {
196    return AbstractType.EMPTY_ANNOTATED_TYPE_ARRAY.clone();
197  }
198
199  /**
200   * Returns {@code null} when invoked.
201   *
202   * @param annotationClass ignored
203   *
204   * @return {@code null} in all cases
205   *
206   * @nullability This method always returns {@code null}.
207   *
208   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
209   * threads.
210   *
211   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
212   */
213  @Override
214  public final <T extends Annotation> T getAnnotation(final Class<T> annotationClass) {
215    return null;
216  }
217
218  /**
219   * Returns a copy of {@link AbstractType#EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY} when invoked.
220   *
221   * @return a copy of {@link AbstractType#EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY}
222   *
223   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
224   *
225   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
226   * threads.
227   *
228   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
229   */
230  @Override
231  public final Annotation[] getAnnotations() {
232    return EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY.clone();
233  }
234
235  /**
236   * Returns a copy of {@link AbstractType#EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY} when invoked.
237   *
238   * @return a copy of {@link AbstractType#EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY}
239   *
240   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
241   *
242   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
243   * threads.
244   *
245   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
246   */
247  @Override
248  public final Annotation[] getDeclaredAnnotations() {
249    return EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY.clone();
250  }
251
252  /**
253   * Returns a hashcode for this {@link
254   * PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}.
255   *
256   * @return a hashcode for this {@link
257   * PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}
258   *
259   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
260   * threads.
261   *
262   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
263   */
264  @Override
265  public final int hashCode() {
266    return this.hashCode;
267  }
268
269  /**
270   * Returns {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to
271   * this {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}; {@code false}
272   * otherwise.
273   *
274   * <p>An arbitrary {@link Object} is equal to this {@link
275   * PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable} if it is an instance of {@link
276   * TypeVariable} and its {@linkplain TypeVariable#getName() name}
277   * {@linkplain String#equals(Object) is equal to} this {@link
278   * PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}'s {@linkplain #getName() name}
279   * and if its {@linkplain TypeVariable#getBounds() bounds}
280   * {@linkplain Arrays#equals(Object[], Object[]) are equal to} this
281   * {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}'s {@linkplain
282   * #getBounds() bounds}.  Note that this definition of equality is
283   * deliberately different from that honored by the default
284   * JDK-supplied implementation of {@link TypeVariable}.</p>
285   *
286   * @param other the {@link Object} to test; may be {@code null} in
287   * which case {@code false} will be returned
288   *
289   * @return {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to
290   * this {@link PartiallyImplementedTypeVariable}; {@code false}
291   * otherwise
292   *
293   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
294   * threads.
295   *
296   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
297   */
298  @Override
299  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
300    if (other == this) {
301      return true;
302    } else if (other instanceof TypeVariable<?>) {
303      final TypeVariable<?> her = (TypeVariable<?>)other;
304      return
305        Objects.equals(this.getName(), her.getName()) &&
306        Arrays.equals(this.getBounds(), her.getBounds());
307    } else {
308      return false;
309    }
310  }
311
312  /**
313   * Returns the return value of invoking the {@link #getName()} method.
314   *
315   * @return the return value of invoking the {@link #getName()} method
316   *
317   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
318   *
319   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
320   * threads.
321   *
322   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
323   */
324  @Override
325  public final String toString() {
326    return this.getName();
327  }
328
329  private final void readObject(final ObjectInputStream stream) throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException {
330    stream.defaultReadObject();
331    final Object bounds = stream.readObject();
332    assert bounds instanceof Serializable[];
333    final Serializable[] serializableBounds = (Serializable[])bounds;
334    if (serializableBounds == null || serializableBounds.length <= 0) {
335      this.bounds = OBJECT;
336    } else if (serializableBounds.length == 1) {
337      final Object bound = serializableBounds[0];
338      if (bound == null || Object.class.equals(bound)) {
339        this.bounds = OBJECT;
340      } else {
341        assert bound instanceof Type;
342        this.bounds = new Type[] { (Type)bound };
343      }
344    } else {
345      this.bounds = new Type[serializableBounds.length];
346      System.arraycopy(serializableBounds, 0, this.bounds, 0, serializableBounds.length);
347    }
348    this.hashCode =
349      Objects.hash(this.getName(),
350                   this.getBounds());
351  }
352  
353  private final void writeObject(final ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
354    stream.defaultWriteObject();
355    final Type[] originalBounds = this.getBounds();
356    if (originalBounds.length <= 0) {
357      stream.writeObject(new Serializable[0]);
358    } else {
359      final Serializable[] newBounds = new Serializable[originalBounds.length];
360      for (int i = 0; i < newBounds.length; i++) {
361        newBounds[i] = Types.toSerializableType(originalBounds[i]);
362      }
363      stream.writeObject(newBounds);
364    }
365  }
366
367}
